page.title: 04AMUSEMENT ARCADES
page.content: {Clacton Amusement Arcades}are a main attraction for teenagers on holiday or who live here.The machines in the arcade are really great.In the arcade they also play{prize bingo}and have some gift shops.The arcades are down Pier Avenue which goes down to the Pier Gap.There is also some small tea cafes down there for people whose children are in the arcades.The kiddie rides are outside not undercover like the machines and it has a lot of fun facilities.The main gift shop is called{Spalls}with souvenir gifts and jewellery.The arcades have lights lighted during the day and night saying BINGO and{AMUSEMENTS}which looks nice and BRIGHT.
